name: X Bridge Bot
description: SpaceBridgeBot is the Telegram Bot helps you trade between ETH, BNB, SOL, DOGE, TRON, XMR, and XRP both publicly or privately in just a few simple steps in Anonymously and untraceable transactions. Spacers Hub Offers Premium the high-end service with extra perks! Staking $XFER tokens unlocks exclusive trade routes, unrestricted size, staking rewards, referral rewards, and priority trades! explore the Features of the SpacersHub by scrolling down Get started with just a few clicks Open Space Bridge Bot and click 'Start'. Choose 'New Order' or 'Private Order'. Select the blockchain network. Enter the token amount and destination wallet. Confirm the unique receiver address and proceed Track or wait for processing. Receive the bridged tokens in your wallet.
